name: FetchVendorCreditRefunds
description:
Retrieve a paginated list of vendor credit refunds.

Use this tool to obtain detailed information about vendor credit refunds, useful for financial reconciliation and tracking vendor transactions. This tool supports pagination.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization for which to list vendor credit refunds.

parameters.name: search_vendor_credits_by_customer_id
parameters.description: Search for vendor credits linked to a specific customer using their ID.

value_schema.description: Search vendor credits by vendor credit customer ID

parameters.name: vendor_credit_last_modified_time
parameters.description: Search vendor credits using the last modified time as a filter. This expects a date-time string, typically in ISO 8601 format, to narrow down results by when they were last modified.

value_schema.description: Search vendor credits by vendor credit last modfified time

parameters.name: sort_vendor_credits_by_column
parameters.description: Specify the column to sort vendor credits by. Allowed values: vendor_name, vendor_credit_number, balance, total, date, created_time, last_modified_time, reference_number.

value_schema.description: Sort vendor credits by following columns vendor_name, vendorcredit_number, balance, total, date and created_time. Allowed Values: vendor_name, vendor_credit_number, balance, total, date, created_time, last_modified_time and reference_number.

parameters.name: pagination_page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number of results to retrieve for pagination. Default is 1.

value_schema.description: Page number for pagination. Specify which page of results to retrieve. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Number of vendor credits to return per page. Default is 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records per page for pagination. Controls how many vendor credits are returned in each page. Default value is 200.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the zoho-books API.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: Search vendor credits by vendor credit customer ID

value_schema.description: Search vendor credits by vendor credit customer ID

parameters.name: last_modified_time
parameters.description: Search vendor credits by vendor credit last modfified time

value_schema.description: Search vendor credits by vendor credit last modfified time

parameters.name: sort_column
parameters.description: Sort vendor credits by following columns vendor_name, vendorcredit_number, balance, total, date and created_time. Allowed Values: vendor_name, vendor_credit_number, balance, total, date, created_time, last_modified_time and reference_number.

value_schema.description: Sort vendor credits by following columns vendor_name, vendorcredit_number, balance, total, date and created_time. Allowed Values: vendor_name, vendor_credit_number, balance, total, date, created_time, last_modified_time and reference_number.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Specify which page of results to retrieve. Default value is 1.

value_schema.description: Page number for pagination. Specify which page of results to retrieve. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of records per page for pagination. Controls how many vendor credits are returned in each page. Default value is 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records per page for pagination. Controls how many vendor credits are returned in each page. Default value is 200.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
